title: Rahper Admin Portal
technologies: React JS | HTML/CSS/SCSS | Bootstrap | PrimeReact | Google Apis | Redux Toolkit | Socket.io
description: Implemented the admin panel for Rahper, a carpooling app, using React.js, PrimeReact, and Redux Toolkit. Ensured a responsive UI, Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), and dynamic routing. Developed key modules like roles management, ride history, support chat, document verification, and SMS logs, enhancing functionality, security, and user experience.

title: CDA Survey App
technologies: React JS | HTML/CSS/SCSS | TypeScript | PrimeReact | AntDesign
description: Designed and developed a robust web application for the Capital Development Authority (CDA) to streamline survey management using React, Redux, and TypeScript. Built dynamic survey management for efficient tracking of society surveys and violations. Enhanced data visualization with Ant Design Charts and enabled real-time notifications using socket.io-client. Optimized for responsive design across desktop and mobile devices, with PDF export functionality using jspdf.
